IconState Class Reference

Detailed Description

An icon state defines the size and the mode of an icon. If an icon is defined by an icon set, the unique icon ID of the icon set together with the icon state is used to get the icon itself by invoking the the customizable methods GuiEngineConfig::GetImageIcon and GuiEngineConfig::GetBitmapIcon.
See also:
IconSet
